mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Social security
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Social security: Does it have a future?
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This program topic is the changes President Ronald Reagan has already made in the Social Security System and the proposed changes coming before Congress this fall
